name: Majeed Zahor
story: Majeed Zahor was born in Iran and joined the military at a young age. He quickly advanced in the ranks due to his technical ability and dedication to his work. He is highly skilled in the use of anti-tank missiles and is often called upon to provide support in difficult situations. Although he is reserved and cautious in his approach to his work, he has gained the respect of his peers and superiors for his dedication and ability to get the job done.
